creator: jz-2007@heute-morgen.de
text:
POOL_DEBUG has been renamed to APR_POOL_DEBUG and ALLOC_DEBUG has been removed
according to grep (or I can't guess the new name).

With this it is better to entirely remove debugging.html than to display
misleading information.

creator: rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.

Interestingly, the only place in the code that references ALLOC_DEBUG is in test/

This code itself is (c) 1999 Roy Fielding, and has, to the best of my knowledge, no use at anymore.
creator: i.galic@brainsware.org

text: This document has been yanked in trunk and in 2.4.
